name: Adriana.System 3
description:
Gameplay:

is a game in the genre of Bullet Hell

where you have to dodge a lot of bullets

Story:

For a month no one has seen Ioann sister,

and in her room they found a note with the inscription now you will all live in peace and harmony,

my body will protect you after this,

Ioann went in search of his sister

Info-Develop:

The game was made in less than a month

and this is my first game in this genre
